title: XDM Business Opportunity Details
description: This mixin is used to capture and maintain additional opportunity attributes that are used by industry crm systems.

xdm:opportunityOwnerID.title: opportunity Owner Id
xdm:opportunityOwnerID.description: Unique ID of the internal owner for this opportunity.

xdm:campaignID.title: Campaign ID
xdm:campaignID.description: Unique ID of the campaign related to this opportunity.

xdm:fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
xdm:fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year this opportunity is targeted for.

xdm:fiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
xdm:fiscalQuarter.description: The fiscal quarter this opportunity is targeted for.

xdm:forecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
xdm:forecastCategory.description: Forecast category for the opportunity based on the opportunity stage.

xdm:forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
xdm:forecastCategoryName.description: Name of the forecast category for the opportunity.

xdm:isClosed.title: Closed Flag
xdm:isClosed.description: Boolean indicating if the opportunity is closed.

xdm:isWon.title: Won Flag
xdm:isWon.description: Boolean indicating if the opportunity was won.

xdm:probabilityPercentage.title: Probability Percentage
xdm:probabilityPercentage.description: Probability as a percentage that the opportunity will closed, represented as a number between 0 and 1..

xdm:opportunityAmount.title: Opportunity Amount
xdm:opportunityAmount.description: Estimated sale amount for the opportunity.

xdm:expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
xdm:expectedRevenue.description: Expected revenue based on the probability percentage and opportunity amount.

xdm:opportunityQuantity.title: Opportunity Quantity
xdm:opportunityQuantity.description: Total quantity of all related products for the opportunity.

xdm:expectedCloseDate.title: Expected Close Date
xdm:expectedCloseDate.description: Expected date the opportunity will close.

xdm:actualCloseDate.title: Actual Close Date
xdm:actualCloseDate.description: Actual date the opportunity was closed.

xdm:lastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
xdm:lastActivityDate.description: Date of last activity for the opportunity.

xdm:leadSource.title: Lead Source
xdm:leadSource.description: Source that the opportunity originated from.

xdm:nextStep.title: Next Step
xdm:nextStep.description: Description of the next step for the opportunity.
